name: sub hunt
description:
This game was made for ludem dare in 48 hrs, first time doing a game jam in 48 hrs this was an interesting one! heres a link to the ludem dare page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/sub-hunt

due to ludem dares rule set you must post source code, it is labeled "ludemDare48" you have to download and import it into unity to see it.
